bill_title: add a county as able to be assigned responsibility for secondary highways on municipal boundaries.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to add a county as able to be assigned responsibility for secondary highways on municipal boundaries. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 31-17-16 be AMENDED: 31-17-16. The secondary highways on the boundary line of any municipality shall must be assigned to such the municipality and adjoining civil township, county, or unorganized territory as provided in §§ 31-17-5 and 31-17-6.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
